name: Moldy Green Rabbit (UNFINISHED)
description:
Mouldy Green Rabbit returns in an epic remake of the original game from 2016. Walk around the iconic Mouldy Green Island and do... rabbit things. 

I don't know what this game is to be honest, but you should play it anyway. 

THIS VERSION OF THE GAME IS AN OLD ONE. NEW VERSION WILL BE RELEASED SOON(ish)
